title: can anyone I.D. this hand-drawn lettering?
content:
now i know these are not fonts but hand-drawn lettering; however, i’ve been looking all over the place for similar fonts to download. does anyone have any suggestions, or know of any fonts that are similar to these two different lettering styles?

thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090918230353/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_92.jpg) | 127.15 KB |
author: zaziejolie

comments.content:
Hi:

Perhaps you can start with Emmascript, here’s a link:

[http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0003431](http://web.archive.org/web/20090918230353/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0003431 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0003431")

Hope it helps!!

Q™ Says: It’s All About The Fonts!

There are no repeated duplicate letters, which strongly suggests that this is actually handwritten and scanned. Not a font.

- Mike Yanega

More typefaces that emulate [Everyday Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20090918230353/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script09Pg1.html) in Mike’s great database.  
F
